basics.name: Florian Herrengt
basics.label: Javascript Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Javascript developer with Fullstack experience and familiar with Machine Learning and Python. Experience of CI technologies and agile environment. Keen to share knowledge and learn from others

work.summary: Easy-to-use social media and campaign management platform, designed specifically for charities and social enterprises
highlights: Serverless environment
Graphql api using Apollo
Postgres
React / Sass
Elasticsearch
Jest unit and integration testing

work.summary: Skim.it's machine learning technology searches for relevant business intelligence about your customers and competitors and delivers it to you when you need it the most
highlights: Successfully built an end to end SaaS application using NodeJS, MongoDb, Redis and React (isomorphic/universal)
OneNote add-in demoed at the Microsoft built conference in San Fransisco
100% code coverage using mocha
Hosted on AWS (Route53, CloudFront, S3, API Gateway, Lambda, Elastic Beanstalk, SNS, SES, SQS)
First approach to Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing (Python)

work.summary: A full-service digital content agency designed for next generation marketing mostly focused on videos.
highlights: Build new or improve existing video players (Backbone, video.js)
Add unit and E2E testing to most recent projects (mocha, webdriver.io + saucelab)
Build a proof of concept mobile app for M&S (Cordova, Ionic, Angular 1)

work.summary: With offices in 17 countries and over 1000 staff, IG Index is a global leader in online trading.
highlights: Add client side rendered web app (Angular 1) on the top of a REST API to edit the site map
Optimise loading time (lazy loading for every components)
Unit testing (Karma/Jasmine)
Saas application using ExtJS, PHP and MySQL
Generate PDF reports (up to 1.2M lines) by extracting relevant information from the database (SQL queries)
Tracking down memory leaks (users almost never close the app)

work.summary: Haubourdin is a commune in northern France.
highlights: Website + CMS (no framework)
Mobile version (jQuery mobile)
Application to check and book available equipment (jQuery/PHP)

work.summary: The aim of the Intuitive Travel Company is to support players in the tourism industry to meet the challenges of digital technology.
highlights: Automated video conversion (Apache + ffmpeg)
Drupal website

skills.name: Backend
keywords: AWS (Route53, CloudFront, S3, SQS, SNS, SES, API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDb, Elastic Beanstalk)

references.name: Joshua Evans - Skimit CTO
references.reference: It’s my absolute pleasure to recommend Florian Herrengt as a Fullstack developer.  I thoroughly enjoyed my time working with him, and came to know him as a truly valuable asset to absolutely any team.

references.name: Danny Hope - Skimit Product Owner
references.reference: Without a doubt, I confidently recommend Florian to join your team. As a dedicated and knowledgeable employee and an all-around great person, I know that he will be a beneficial addition to your organisation.
